name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Results-driven R&D Developer with 13+ years of experience in delivering high-performance applications, specializing in **Python**, **React**, **Next.js**, **FastAPI**, and **APIs**. Proven expertise in developing AI/LLM pipelines, real-time services, and innovative solutions, with strong proficiency in **Git** and **CI/CD** processes for efficient software development life cycle (SDLC) management. Experienced in deploying cloud-native systems across AWS and Azure, ensuring robust and scalable infrastructure.
Demonstrated success in implementing high-impact projects across the healthcare and financial sectors, with a focus on compliance-driven development aligning with industry standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS. A strong communicator with a background in innovation consulting, adept at translating complex technical concepts for diverse audiences.
